member.summary: Renders a NetworkDiagramView control instance.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView
member.summary: Displays task data in a customizable Network Diagram control.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.ClientID
member.summary: Gets or sets an identifier to be applied as id attribute of the client side component container (div element).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets the width to be applied for the client side component container (div element).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.Height
member.summary: Gets or sets the height to be applied for the client side component container (div element).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.BorderStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the border style to be applied for the client side component container (div element).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.BorderWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the border width to be applied for the client side component container (div element).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.BorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the border color to be applied for the client side component container (div element).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.BackColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color to be applied for the client side component container (div element).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.ForeColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the foreground color to be applied for the client side component container (div element).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.InitializingContent
member.summary: Gets or sets the inner HTML to be used while initializing (such as a "Please wait..." message).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.InitializingClientCode
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of JavaScript function body code statements (considering control parameter), to be executed before client side component initialization.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.InitializedClientCode
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of JavaScript function body code statements (considering control parameter), to be executed after client side component initialization.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.Target
member.summary: Gets or sets a presentation target to be used to initialize the default values of some of the appearance properties of the control; it is set to Standard by default.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.Theme
member.summary: Gets or sets a presentation theme to be used to initialize the default values of some of the appearance properties of the control; it is set to Modern by default.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.ContainerCssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the CSS class to apply to the main content container within the control.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.CanUserRearrangeItems
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user can change the canvas positions of task items in the control by drag and drop operations.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.SnapRearrangedItemsToGuidelines
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the task item shapes are snapping to row and column based guidelines in the control during drag and drop based rearrange operations.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.ItemWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the column width of any item presented in the diagram; by default it is set to 220.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.ItemHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the row height of any item presented in the diagram; by default it is set to 100.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.AspectRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the aspect ratio of the diagram, indicating the rate between horizontal and vertical item layout positioning.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.ShapeWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the column width of any shape presented in the diagram; by default it is set to 212.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.ShapeHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the row height of any shape presented in the diagram; by default it is set to 92.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.MinDependencyLineLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum length of the dependency lines displayed in the diagram at initialization time; by default it is set to 48.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.DiagramMargin
member.summary: Gets or sets the margin to preserve around the diagram; by default it is set to 16.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.ShapeCssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the CSS class to apply to the shapes in the diagram.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.ShapeFill
member.summary: Gets or sets the color to be used to fill the shapes in the diagram.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.ShapeStroke
member.summary: Gets or sets the color to be used to draw the borders of the shapes in the diagram.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.MilestoneCssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the CSS class to apply to the milestone shapes in the diagram.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.MilestoneStroke
member.summary: Gets or sets the color to be used to draw the supplemental borders of milestone shapes in the diagram.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.DependencyLineCssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the CSS class to apply to apply to polylines displayed between dependent task shapes in the diagram.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.DependencyLineStroke
member.summary: Gets or sets the color to be used to draw the polylines displayed between dependent task shapes in the diagram.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.IsTaskToolTipVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether task shape tool tips are presented.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.IsDependencyToolTipVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether dependency line tool tips are presented.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.TaskTemplateClientCode
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of JavaScript function body code statements (considering control, and item parameters), returning SVG content to be presented for all the items in the diagram (usually a task shape).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.ExtraTaskTemplateClientCode
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of JavaScript function body code statements (considering control, and item parameters), returning extra SVG content to be presented for items in the diagram.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.ItemTemplateClientCode
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of JavaScript function body code statements (considering control, and item parameters), returning SVG content to be presented for a specific item in the diagram (usually a tool tip).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.DependencyLineTemplateClientCode
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of JavaScript function body code statements (considering control, item, and predecessor item parameters), returning SVG content to be presented as dependency line for an item and a specified predecessor item in the diagram, between a task and its predecessor (usually a polyline computed based on the task and predecessor shape positions in the diagram).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.PredecessorItemTemplateClientCode
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of JavaScript function body code statements (considering control, item, and predecessor item parameters), returning SVG content to be presented for an item and a specific predecessor item in the diagram (usually a tool tip).

member.summary: Gets a setting value.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.SetValue``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Sets a setting value.

member.summary: Called before rendering (i.e. ToString call).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.Items
member.summary: Gets or sets the task items to be presented in the Network Diagram.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.ToString
member.summary: Renders the contents of the control.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.IsCritical(DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramItem)
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the specified item is critical within the project consisting of all task dependencies within the control.
member.returns: A value indicating whether the specified item is critical within the project consisting of all task dependencies within the control.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.IsCritical(DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkPredecessorItem)
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the specified predecessor item is critical within the project consisting of all task dependencies within the control.
member.returns: A value indicating whether the specified predecessor item is critical within the project consisting of all task dependencies within the control.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.GetCriticalItems
member.summary: Iterates the critical items of the project consisting of all task dependencies within the control.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.GetCriticalDependencies
member.summary: Iterates the critical predecessor items of the project consisting of all task dependencies within the control.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.GetStart
member.summary: Retreives the start item of the diagram.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.GetFinish
member.summary: Retreives the finish item of the diagram.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.GetPredecessors(DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramItem)
member.summary: Iterates predecessor items of the specified item satisfying the specified dependency type condition in the Network Diagram related collection as NetworkDiagramItem objects.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.GetSuccessors(DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramItem)
member.summary: Iterates successor items of the specified item in the Network Diagram related collection (i.e. those that have the specified item defined as a predecessor of any dependency type).

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramView.GetSuccessorPredecessorItems(DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramItem)
member.summary: Iterates successor items of the specified item in the Network Diagram related collection (i.e. those that have the specified item defined as a predecessor of any dependency type) as PredecessorItem objects.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramItem
member.summary: Represents a task item to be presented in a control.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramItem.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramItem.Content
member.summary: Gets or sets the content of the current item, displayed in the NetworkDiagramView control. It is passed to the client side as the item.content field accessible from the client code (ToString method is used to convert the value).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramItem.DisplayedText
member.summary: Gets or sets the textual abbreviation of the current item, displayed within the NetworkDiagramView control. It is passed to the client side as the item.displayedText field accessible from the client code.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramItem.EarlyStart
member.summary: Gets or sets the early start date and time of the current task item. It is passed to the client side as the item.earlyStart field accessible from the client code.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramItem.EarlyFinish
member.summary: Gets or sets the early finish date and time of the current task item. It is passed to the client side as the item.earlyFinish field accessible from the client code.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramItem.LateStart
member.summary: Gets or sets the late start date and time of the current task item. It is passed to the client side as the item.lateStart field accessible from the client code.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramItem.LateFinish
member.summary: Gets or sets the late finish date and time of the current task item. It is passed to the client side as the item.lateFinish field accessible from the client code.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramItem.Effort
member.summary: Gets or sets the effort of the current task item. It is passed to the client side as the item.effort field accessible from the client code.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramItem.IsMilestone
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current item represents a milestone. A milestone task is displayed in the Network Diagram view using a different shape template It is passed to the client side as the item.isMilestone field accessible from the client code.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramItem.Slack
member.summary: Gets or sets the slack of the current task item. It is passed to the client side as the item.slack field accessible from the client code.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramItem.Predecessors
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection that defines predecessor items referring the task items that the current item depends of, and having the relations displayed in the Network Diagram view as dependency lines. It is passed to the client side as the item.predecessors array accessible from the client code.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramItem.IsShapeVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the task shape is displayed in the chart area for this item.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramItem.ShapeCssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the CSS class to apply to all item shapes in the diagram.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramItem.ShapeFill
member.summary: Gets or sets the color used to fill the task shape of the current item in the chart.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramItem.ShapeStroke
member.summary: Gets or sets the color used to draw the borders of the task shape of the current item in the chart.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramItem.MilestoneCssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the CSS class to supplementary apply to milestone shapes in the diagram.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramItem.MilestoneStroke
member.summary: Gets or sets the color used to draw the borders of the milestone shape of the current item in the chart, if it is declared as a milestone.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramItem.TaskTemplateClientCode
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of function body code statements (considering item parameter), returning SVG content to be presented for the current item in the diagram.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramItem.DisplayedRowIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the desired row index to be used for positioning the current item shape vertically when displaying it in the NetworkDiagramView control (NaN by default, i.e. automatically positioned; non-integral values are supported to position items using custom non-grid alignment). It is passed to the client side as the item.displayedRowIndex field accessible from the client code.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramItem.DisplayedColumnIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the desired column index to be used for positioning the current item shape vertically when displaying it in the NetworkDiagramView control (NaN by default, i.e. automatically positioned; non-integral values are supported to position items using custom non-grid alignment). It is passed to the client side as the item.displayedColumnIndex field accessible from the client code.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramItem.CustomValues
member.summary: Gets or sets a dictionary representing custom properties and values for the current item. The values are passed to the client side as read only item.custom{Key}Value fields accessible from the client code ({Key} gets replaced by the actual dictionary key values).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramItem.Tag
member.summary: Gets or sets an object that contains information that is associated with the current item. The value should be serializable as it is internally preserved within the ViewState of the page. It is passed to the client side as the read only item.tag field accessible from the client code (ToString method is used to convert the value).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramItem.Key
member.summary: Gets or sets an associated external numeric key for the current item. When set to a non-zero value, it is passed to the client side as the read only item.key field accessible from the client code.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkDiagramItem.GlobalKey
member.summary: Gets or sets an associated external globally unique key for the current item. When set to a non-zero value, it is passed to the client side as the read only item.globalKey field accessible from the client code.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkPredecessorItem
member.summary: Represents a predecessor item generating a dependency between another task and the current task, within the collection of a NetworkDiagramItem object.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkPredecessorItem.Item
member.summary: Gets or sets the task item that precedes the owner of the predecessor item (the item that the current item depends of). It is passed to the client side as the read only predecessorItem.item field accessible from the client code.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkPredecessorItem.DependencyLineCssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the CSS class to apply to the dependency line in the diagram.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkPredecessorItem.DependencyLineStroke
member.summary: Gets or sets the color used to draw the dependency line in the diagram.

member.summary: Gets or sets an object that contains information that is associated with the current item. The value is not internally preserved within the ViewState of the page. It is passed to the client side as the read only item.tag field accessible from the client code (ToString method is used to convert the value).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.NetworkPredecessorItem.Key
member.summary: Gets or sets an associated external numeric key for the current item. When set to a non-zero value, it is passed to the client side as the read only item.key field accessible from the client code.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.PertChartItem
member.summary: Represents a task event item to be presented in a control.

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.PertChartItem.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.PertChartItem.Content
member.summary: Gets or sets the content of the current item, displayed in the PertChartView control. It is passed to the client side as the item.content field accessible from the client code (ToString method is used to convert the value).

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.PertChartItem.DisplayedText
member.summary: Gets or sets the textual abbreviation of the current item, displayed within the PertChartView control. It is passed to the client side as the item.displayedText field accessible from the client code.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.PertChartItem.Predecessors
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection that defines predecessor items referring the task event items that the current item depends of, and having the relations displayed in the PERT Chart view as dependency lines. It is passed to the client side as the item.predecessors array accessible from the client code.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.PertChartItem.IsShapeVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the task event shape is displayed in the chart area for this item.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.PertChartItem.ShapeCssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the CSS class to apply to all item shapes in the diagram.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.PertChartItem.ShapeFill
member.summary: Gets or sets the color used to fill the task event shape of the current item in the chart.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.PertChartItem.ShapeStroke
member.summary: Gets or sets the color used to draw the borders of the task event shape of the current item in the chart.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.PertChartItem.TaskEventTemplateClientCode
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of function body code statements (considering item parameter), returning SVG content to be presented for the current item in the diagram.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.PertChartItem.DisplayedRowIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the desired row index to be used for positioning the current item shape vertically when displaying it in the PertChartView control (NaN by default, i.e. automatically positioned; non-integral values are supported to position items using custom non-grid alignment). It is passed to the client side as the item.displayedRowIndex field accessible from the client code.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.PertChartItem.DisplayedColumnIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the desired column index to be used for positioning the current item shape vertically when displaying it in the PertChartView control (NaN by default, i.e. automatically positioned; non-integral values are supported to position items using custom non-grid alignment). It is passed to the client side as the item.displayedColumnIndex field accessible from the client code.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the task effort represented by the current predecessor item is virtual, displayed as a dashed line in the chart. It is passed to the client side as the predecessorItem.isEffortVirtual field accessible from the client code.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.PresentationTarget
member.summary: Indicates the target settings to be applied when default values are used (i.e. when specific values are not indicated) for certain appearance properties of a control.

member.name: F:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.PresentationTarget.Standard
member.summary: Presents the Gantt Chart area with an optional attached data grid, suitable with large output screen application development.

member.name: F:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.PresentationTarget.Phone
member.summary: Presents the Gantt Chart area without an attached data grid, displaying the task content values instead of assignments content values, best suitable for Microsoft® Windows® Phone® 8 or other small output screen application development.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.PresentationTheme
member.summary: Indicates the theme settings to be applied when default values are used (i.e. when specific values are not indicated) for certain appearance properties of a control.

member.name: F:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.PresentationTheme.Modern
member.summary: Presents the task bars and other visual elements in the Gantt Chart using a simple modern style using solid colors and square corners, similar to Modern UI style application development in Microsoft® Windows® 8.

member.name: F:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.PresentationTheme.ModernBordered
member.summary: Presents the task bars and other visual elements in the Gantt Chart using a simple modern style using solid colors and square corners, while higher contrast solid borders are applied to the elements in order to to enable easier visual identification.

member.name: F:DlhSoft.Web.Mvc.Pert.PresentationTheme.Aero
member.summary: Presents the task bars and other visual elements in the Gantt Chart using a previously common style using full gradients and round corners, similar to Aero presentation in Microsoft® Windows® 7 and Vista®.
